task_completion.description: The degree to which the task is completed successfully

action_legality.description: Actions must be chosen from the given available actions, with illegitimate actions taken into account

action_adequacy.description: The appropriateness of chosen actions to achieve the given task

thought_process.description: The quality of the thought process and planning throughout the task

interaction_flow.description: The smoothness and continuity of interactions with the environment

task_time.description: The time taken to accomplish the task
